name: Social Credit Simulator
description:
Social Credit Simulator is a 2D game in which you control a person who assigns each person a social rating based on his actions and social status, age, place of work.

Do the right thing and the ruling party will be pleased with you! Get three bowls of rice to feed your family and survive. Game Functions: single life game, the right to choose actions, music from Milwaukee, graphics from afinari, Difficulty changes as you progress.
